name: ListJobOpenings
description:
Retrieve a list of current job openings.

Used to fetch a list of available job openings from the Ashby platform. Requires the 'jobsRead' permission to access opening list information.

parameters.name: page_cursor
parameters.description: String indicating which page of job openings results to fetch, used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch

parameters.name: last_sync_token
parameters.description: Opaque token representing the last time a full set of results was fetched. Use this to sync data updates.

value_schema.description: Opaque token representing the last time a full set of results was fetched.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch

value_schema.description: Opaque cursor indicating which page of results to fetch

parameters.name: syncToken
parameters.description: Opaque token representing the last time a full set of results was fetched.

value_schema.description: Opaque token representing the last time a full set of results was fetched.
